name: TidePools
description:
Controls:

A - D:  Pan left or right

W - S: Move forward/backward

Mouse Scroll:  Look up and down

1st Note:  Extremely laggy as webGL

2nd Note:  Must expand screen to see counts.

This is some work I did over the holidays.  Eventually, it will be an evolution game where you modify the behavior of critters before you turn them loose in, "the tidepool."

Once creatures are free, they roam around using their native programming.

This is all really primitive at the moment.  There's no interaction and the camera will not stop you from flying off the end of the world.  I wanted to publish though to make sure I keep the game in publishable shape as I work on it.

I do plan to start a devlog to track development.  

I would, of course, like any and all feedback.

TY!

Kate
